text: Hi everyone.  We just picked up HubSpot cos.  we are going to be starting with a new website.  I was going to purchase a template first and wondering if I just purchase the template or if I really need to get a HubSpot developer on before I buy the template. I have no idea if I will mess up anything with purchasing first. I am on the business side of our business and not a developer

Hi <@U013NTEBZMX>, you can use the template same as you purchase but every website/business should have it's own branding and logos. So, you might need a developer to adjust that templates accordingly.

hi <@U011UH5NZM4>, ok. it sounds like I can purchases the template and it will pop up in our HubSpot environment.  after I purchase it I can then bring on a HubSpot cos certified person to do any additional items needed and marketing can add content and we can push live.
